QuestData.Title: The Twilight Flight
QuestData.Description: Terrath wants you to make your way to the far end of the precipice to fight Zoltrik Drakebane. He is on his way there as well, but he thinks Zoltrik is likely to take to the sky.$B$BQuite an impression you seem to have made, little one. Have you ever mused that none of this would have happened if I had just stepped on you during our first meeting? Fate is a strange thing.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Leader of the Twilight Drakeriders in Deepholm.
QuestData.CompletionText: It is good to see you on the battlefield again.
QuestData.RewardText: It is good that you were here. I find my size to be inhibiting when it comes to dragon riding, strangely.
